description:
With Ohken Fuuki`s life hanging in the balance, Touhou Gessho arrives just in time to save him from certain death. Will they be able to safely leave the Ohken mansion? Meanwhile, in the future, Tosan Roro employs a particular method to try and help Haku Gessho and Tosan Suusu regain the memories of their past lives.
Source: crunchyroll
